arts.ttl: Coventry City match winner realises lifetime ambition with 'dream come true' moment
arts.sum: Scoring a last-minute winner for the team you support; I don’t think it will ever get better than that unless it’s the play-off final or something like that. Get the latest Coventry City news sent straight to your phone by joining our Sky Blues WhatsApp group.

arts.ttl: Portsmouth captain reveals impact of gut-wrenching Coventry City defeat on dressing room
arts.sum: Regan Poole admitted late heartache at Coventry was the toughest Pompey blow to take this season.

arts.ttl: Frank Lampard hails 'amazing' Coventry City match winner amid Portsmouth admission
arts.sum: Get the latest Coventry City news sent straight to your phone by joining our Sky Blues WhatsApp group. I think it’s a collective one as well for the stadium, the players and the fans because we have shown that this group has got character.

arts.ttl: 'Madness': John Mousinho points the finger after Portsmouth's stoppage-time heartbreak at Coventry
arts.sum: John Mousinho blamed ‘10 seconds of madness’ as Pompey endured more heartbreak on the road.

arts.ttl: Championship: Jamie Paterson strikes late to put Coventry in playoff places
arts.sum: Sky Blues snatch late victory over Portsmouth Bottom club Plymouth well beaten by Swansea Coventry moved into the Championship play-off places after a dramatic 1-0 victory over visitors Portsmouth. The game seemed destined for a frustrating stalemate from the Sky Blues’ perspective, but Jamie Paterson had other ideas. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Coventry 1 Portsmouth 0: Neil Allen's verdict - More away-day heartache for Blues, but none as brutal as this
arts.sum: John Mousinho said Pompey were close, well on this occasion they were 34 seconds away.

arts.ttl: Coventry City player ratings after home town boy hits late stunner to fire Sky Blues back up to sixth - Andy Turner
arts.sum: Jack Rudoni went closest in the first half for Coventry when he threw himself at a Milan van Ewijk cross and headed agonisingly just wide of the near post while Bobby Thomas also sent a header narrowly over before the two sides went in all square at the break. City were denied an early penalty appeal when Andre Dozzell put his hands up to block a Tatsuhiro Sakamoto shot but the referee waved play on despite being in a good position top view the incident, which replays showed the home side had a really good case.

arts.ttl: Coventry-born Jamie Paterson the late hero as Sky Blues return to the top six
arts.sum: The midfielder’s goal was enough to see off Portsmouth.

arts.ttl: ‘Heroic showing deserved more’, ‘player of the season stock grows’, ‘selfless display’: Jordan Cross' Portsmouth ratings from Coventry defeat
arts.sum: The ratings are in from Pompey’s clash with Coventry City tonight.

arts.ttl: Surprise start for youngster as Portsmouth drop captain and make two changes at Coventry
arts.sum: Pompey have dropped skipper Matt Ritchie for their crunch clash at Coventry.
